definition: to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society

sentences.english: Carnitine is a nutrient that helps the body turn fat into energy.
sentences.chinese: 肉碱是一种营养，帮助人体脂肪转化为能量。

sentences.english: Fiber will also help regulate the appearance of cellulite.
sentences.chinese: 纤维也会帮助控制脂肪团的形成。

sentences.english: Meditation can help, and should be your first choice before medication.
sentences.chinese: 沉思能帮助你并应该是你就医前的首选。

sentences.english: We are committed to help them do the latter.
sentences.chinese: 我们承诺将帮助他们化敌为友。

sentences.english: Can web vulnerability scanners help you remediate the vulnerability?
sentences.chinese: Web漏洞扫描器能帮助我们修补漏洞吗？

sentences.english: Pregame warming-up practice on shooting! It does help.
sentences.chinese: 赛前准备活动投篮练习，是很有帮助的。

sentences.english: Gillett and Hicks hired Barclays Capital to put out feelers internationally to find a buyer.
sentences.chinese: 吉列特和希克斯委托巴克莱帮助他们全球寻找买主。

sentences.english: Should one renounce Nirvana oneself, in order to help others towards it first?
sentences.chinese: 人应该放弃自己的涅磐，为了首先帮助它人达到它？

sentences.english: I worked with Viktor Frankl, a Nazi prison camp survivor, for many years.
sentences.chinese: 长期以来，我曾帮助过一位纳粹集中营幸存者。

sentences.english: The hardship of body and mind of man of A phoenix show solicitude for, more help him prostitute of outer call together.
sentences.chinese: 阿凤体恤丈夫身心的辛苦，更帮助他在外召妓。

sentences.english: For now, let others help you be successful.
sentences.chinese: 但是目前，让别人帮助你成功吧。

sentences.english: This initiative helped improve registration of births and deaths at the subdistrict level.
sentences.chinese: 这一举措帮助改善了街道一级的出生和死亡登记。

sentences.english: This article helps you to add a chat system to your environment.
sentences.chinese: 本文帮助您向您的环境添加了一个聊天系统。
这种分类方式能帮助人们节省在图书馆找资料的时间。

sentences.english: I hope that these 17 tips will help you find a way out of grumpiness.
sentences.chinese: 我希望这17个办法可以帮助你脱离暴躁的情绪。

sentences.english: The fact that you have control over all the clients helps.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，你能够控制所有客户的话是很有帮助的。

definition: to be capable of/to be able to/can
to rely on sth (for support etc)/to depend on
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)
to draw support from/with the help of
to exploit/to make use of/to use/to take advantage of/to utilize
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
